  • Constructor Details

    • Dinosaur

      public Dinosaur​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, Sex sex, int startingHitPoints, int maxHitPoints, int maxUnconsciousRounds, int hungerAmount, int turnsToLayEgg, int mateAmount, AgeGroup ageGroup, int timeToGrow, int maxWaterLevel, int corpsePoints)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Dinosaur
      displayChar - Display char of the dinosaur
      sex - Sex of the dinosaur
      startingHitPoints - starting hitpoints for the dinosaur
      maxHitPoints - max hitpoints for the dinosaur
      maxUnconsciousRounds - number of rounds a dinosaur can stay unconscious without dying
      hungerAmount - Amount of health points below which a dinosaur feels hunger
      turnsToLayEgg - turns it takes to lay eggs
      mateAmount - food level above which mating is possible
      ageGroup - Age group of the dino (Baby or Adult)
      timeToGrow - Amount of rounds for the dinosaur to grow from baby to adult
      maxWaterLevel - Upper bound of water level for a dinosaur
      corpsePoints - Amount of points that can be gained by eating the corpse of the current dinosaur

    • getAgeGroup

    • setAgeGroup

      public void setAgeGroup​(AgeGroup ageGroup)
      sets Age Gruop for the dinosaur
      Parameters:
      ageGroup - Age group of the dino (Baby or Adult)

    • isConscious

      public boolean isConscious()
      Description copied from class: Actor
      Is this Actor conscious? Returns true if the current Actor has positive hit points. Actors on zero hit points are deemed to be unconscious. Depending on the game client, this status may be interpreted as either unconsciousness or death, or inflict some other kind of status.
      Overrides:
      isConscious in class Actor
      Returns:
      true if and only if hitPoints is positive.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return action to perform in current turn
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      Action - most appropriate action to perform in current turn

    • thirst

      private Action thirst​(GameMap map)
      a method to check whether a dinosaur is thirsty, and if so return the correct action
      Parameters:
      map - the map that the actor is currently on
      Returns:
      a MoveActorForConsumption action in the direction of the closest lake if thirsty

    • hunger

      private Action hunger​(GameMap map)
      a method to check whether a dinosaur is hungry, and if so return the correct action
      Parameters:
      map - the map that the actor is currently on
      Returns:
      a MoveActorForConsumption action in the direction of the closest food if hungry
